Package br.com.concepting.framework.persistence

Class HibernatePersistence<M extends BaseModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.BasePersistence<org.hibernate.Session,​org.hibernate.Transaction,​M>
      • br.com.concepting.framework.persistence.HibernatePersistence<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - Class that defines the data model of the persistence.

    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICrud<M>, IPersistence<M>
    public abstract class HibernatePersistence<M extends BaseModel>
extends BasePersistence<org.hibernate.Session,​org.hibernate.Transaction,​M>
    Class that defines the basic implementation of the persistence of data models using Hibernate.
    Since:
    1.0.0
